mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_class LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher ON c_tcode = t_code WHERE c_seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_class(c_name, c_sdate, c_edate, c_stime, c_etime, c_tcode, c_ccode) VALUES(#{c_name}, #{c_sdate}, #{c_edate}, #{c_stime}, #{c_etime}, #{c_tcode}, #{c_ccode})
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_class AS c LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher AS t ON c.c_tcode = t.t_code SET c.c_name = #{c_name}, c_sdate = #{c_sdate}, c_edate = #{c_edate}, c_stime = #{c_stime}, c_etime = #{c_etime}, c_tcode = #{c_tcode}, c_ccode = #{c_ccode}, t_name = t.t_name WHERE c.c_seq = #{c_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, t.t_name FROM tbl_class c LEFT JOIN tbl_teacher t ON c.c_tcode = t.t_code WHERE (c.c_sdate) = #{sdate} AND c.c_ccode = #{code}
